name: America Discovers Columbus
ingredients: 11 lb Schreier 2-row pale malt, 1 lb DWC Munich, 0.6 lb DWC CaraVienne, 0.5 lb DWC Biscuit, 0.5 lb Gambrinus Honey Malt, 0.25 lb DWC carapils, 1.5 ounce Columbus hop pellets (12.5% alpha, 60 minute boil), 1/2 ounce Columbus hops (15 minute boil), 1/4 ounce Cascade hops (4.1% alpha, 15 minute boil), 1/2 ounce Columbus (finish), 1/2 ounce Columbus (dry hop one week in primary), ale yeast (Wyeast 1272 or 1056---see notes)
